entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
